descriptionHtml:
Forgotten Mastery brings you some of the most comprehensive and intriguing spells for Skyrim to date! Following on from the Deadly Dragon Spell mod, the arcane arts have now been mastered and brought to you within the ancient Forgotten Scrolls.

You won’t be overwhelmed with hundreds of never used, ill thought out or simply b-r-o-k-e-n spells that some other spell mods may have. It has well themed spells, that are varied, balanced, but do get more powerful as the game goes.

How often would you like to, but in reality really cast more than a hand full of different spells in combat to smite your foes? If you do, then you’re either the stuff of legend or running around headless because they should be dead already!
Forgotten Mastery goes a long way to achieving true combination spell casting, by giving you the ability of mastering a set of spells that will cover your style of play, in your schools of magic, while unleashing a wealth of combined effects that will dazzle even the Archmage.

The spells you use will level up with you and enable you to unlock some of the mysteries hidden within their scripts.

Yes, yes you can make good use of your unspent dragon souls within this spell mod :) Interested?
[heading][color=#92C9EE]What is Forgotten Mastery?[/color][/heading]
Forgotten Mastery adds 28 new spells to your game, each with 6-7 possible improvements to the spell. There are over 200 abilities in total. Most of these are in fact, additional spells.
Spells gain experience as you use them, which allows you to unlock a new effect each time they level up.
These improvements, as well as the 28 spells themselves can be combined for potential greater effects; it’s up to you to decide where your true power and nature lie.

There are also 9 powers to help you complete your style of play. These are mostly passive abilities that last until cancelled.

The \"Forgotten Mastery\" power is used to open the menu to level up your new spells. Simply equip your chosen spell to your *Left hand*, activate the power, and the menu will appear. You can view your current spell experience, remaining points, and the upgrades available for that particular spell here. Also, once you\'ve used a spell enough for it to reach the next level, you will receive a small notification saying \"Your spell has levelled up!\".

Spells gain experience through a successful hit on a target, or when you use them during combat, if it\'s a passive spell or something similar. For every level you gain within your spell, the required experience is increased two-fold. Only the most dedicated will master their craft. The Dovahkiin possess a certain advantage over the normal fair of mages and can spend a dragon soul to increase experience gained by your spells for 1 hour. 
[heading][color=#92C9EE]What are the spells?[/color][/heading]
Lords of Death: Those that dwell in the shadow realms; the Necromancer, Death Knight, Nightcrawler, Warlock and other Shadow Mages who study the dark arts, will learn the Decay, Doom, Shadow Bolt, Cloak of Shadows and Animate Dead spells. 
[img=right]http://static.skyrim.nexusmods.com/images/5288407-1348093430.png[/img]
[i][color=#C4C3D0]The Necromancer is imbued with the power of decay causing victims to wither with disease. They feed off suffering, giving rise to vamperic like healing, weakening their foes and finally delivering deaths immortal embrace.[/color][/i]
[color=#66FF00][size=4]Decay[/size][/color]
[color=#92C9EE]Creates a pestilence on the target, causing x disease damage per sec for x sec[/color]
Destruction - Adept[code]
[color=#CCCCFF]Power[/color][color=#313131]_______________[/color]Increases Decay damage by 50%
[color=#CCCCFF]Torment[/color][color=#313131]_____________[/color]Increases Decay duration by 100%
[color=#CCCCFF]Vampirism[/color][color=#313131]___________[/color]Each tick restores 3 health to the caster
[color=#CCCCFF]Vulnerability[/color][color=#313131]_______[/color]Reduces the target\'s disease resistance by 20% for 10 sec. 
[color=#313131]____________________[/color]Doesn\'t stack.
[color=#CCCCFF]Weakness[/color][color=#313131]____________[/color]Reduces the target\'s physical damage by 33% for 10 sec. 
[color=#313131]____________________[/color]Doesn\'t stack.
[color=#CCCCFF]Corruption[/color][color=#313131]__________[/color]Reduces target\'s armor by 100 for 10 sec
[color=#CCCCFF]Death Touch[/color][color=#313131]_________[/color]Decay deals instant damage, equal to 25% of its total damage
[/code]
[img=right][/img]
[i][color=#C4C3D0]The caster drains the very essence of life and magicka from their victims into themselves. A true master of the dark arts then channels this force by sending it out as negative energy, a substance that protects the caster and hurts the attacker.[/color][/i]
[color=#66FF00][size=4]Doom[/size][/color]
[color=#92C9EE]Curses the target, causing x disease damage per sec for x sec[/color]
Destruction - Adept[code]
[color=#CCCCFF]Power[/color][color=#313131]_______________[/color]Increases Doom damage by 50%
[color=#CCCCFF]Torment[/color][color=#313131]_____________[/color]Increases Decay duration by 100%
[color=#CCCCFF]Drain[/color][color=#313131]_______________[/color]Each tick restores 5 health to the caster
[color=#CCCCFF]Manaburn[/color][color=#313131]____________[/color]Each tick drains 5 magicka from the target
[color=#CCCCFF]Veil of Shadows[/color][color=#313131]_____[/color]Each tick has a chance to apply Veil of Shadows effect to the 
[color=#313131]____________________[/color]caster, reducing all damage taken by 50% for 10 sec
[color=#CCCCFF]Insult[/color][color=#313131]______________[/color]Each tick has a chance to stagger the target
[color=#CCCCFF]Entropy[/color][color=#313131]_____________[/color]Each tick has a chance to instantly deal damage, equal to 25% of 
[color=#313131]____________________[/color]target\'s current health
[/code]
[img=right]http://static.skyrim.nexusmods.com/images/5288407-1348102099.png[/img]
[i][color=#C4C3D0]Relishing in their victim’s pain, a shadowy bolt has been known to break limb from body on its journey from out of the underworld. Those that don’t run off in terror are afflicted by the stench of dying and will feel the full might of the bolt.[/color][/i]
[color=#66FF00][size=4]Shadow Bolt[/size][/color]
[color=#92C9EE]Projects a bolt of dark energy, causing x disease damage to the target[/color] 
??- ??[code]
[color=#CCCCFF]Power[/color][color=#313131]_______________[/color]Increases Shadow Bolt damage by 50%
[color=#CCCCFF]Jinx[/color][color=#313131]________________[/color]Gives a chance to deal double damage
[color=#CCCCFF]Terror[/color][color=#313131]______________[/color]Shadow Bolt has a chance to force your target to flee in fear
[color=#CCCCFF]Master of the Dead[/color][color=#313131]__[/color]Shadow Bolt has a chance to instantly kill undead targets
[color=#CCCCFF]Misery[/color][color=#313131]______________[/color]Shadow Bolt deals twice as much damage to targets, 
[color=#313131]____________________[/color]afflicted with Doom or Decay
[color=#CCCCFF]Torture[/color][color=#313131]_____________[/color]Shadow Bolt has a chance to apply damage-over-time effect on 
[color=#313131]____________________[/color]the target, that deals disease damage over 6 sec
[color=#CCCCFF]Disarm[/color][color=#313131]______________[/color]Shadow Bolt has a chance to disarm the target
[/code]
[img=right]http://static.skyrim.nexusmods.com/images/5288407-1348020881.png[/img]
[i][color=#C4C3D0]Protected by a veil of shadows, it absorbs attacks, disease and poison, sometimes sending it back to enemies. A master of the night, the change comes on as the sun goes down giving the Nightcrawler supernatural speed and the Lords of Death more power.[/color][/i]
[color=#66FF00][size=4]Cloak of Shadows[/size][/color]
[color=#92C9EE]Protects the caster with shadows, reducing damage taken by 10% for x sec[/color]
??- ??[code]
[color=#CCCCFF]Reborn[/color][color=#313131]______________[/color]Cloak of Shadow increases your disease resistance by 75%
[color=#CCCCFF]Deadborn[/color][color=#313131]____________[/color]Cloak of Shadow increases your poison resistance by 75%
[color=#CCCCFF]Toxic blood[/color][color=#313131]_________[/color]Each enemy in melee range will be struck with poison
[color=#CCCCFF]Shadow Armor[/color][color=#313131]________[/color]Increases your armor by 150
[color=#CCCCFF]Nightcrawler[/color][color=#313131]________[/color]Cloak of Shadow increases your movement speed by 33% 
[color=#313131]____________________[/color]when cast from 19:00 to 6:00
[color=#CCCCFF]Backlash[/color][color=#313131]____________[/color]Cloak of Shadows reflects 30% damage back to attacker
[color=#CCCCFF]Nightfall[/color][color=#313131]___________[/color]Cloak of Shadow increases damage of Decay, Doom and  
[color=#313131]____________________[/color]Shadow Bolt by 50% when cast from 19:00 to 6:00
[/code]
[img=right]http://images3.wikia.nocookie.net/__cb20120221192921/elderscrolls/images/thumb/6/63/MAGINVBanish.png/240px-MAGINVBanish.png[/img]
[i][color=#C4C3D0]Evoking dark energies that bind life forces, foes are unnaturally drawn to the caster. Disease comes quickly, with death soon to follow. Those unfortunate to enough to roam during the twilight hours, might encounter the Nightcrawler, who is known to paralyze others with fear.[/color][/i]
[color=#66FF00][size=4]Death Grasp[/size][/color]
[color=#92C9EE]Draws the target towards the caster. Has no effect on the same target for 10 sec[/color] 
??- ??[code]
[color=#CCCCFF]Deadly Grip[/color][color=#313131]_________[/color]Infects the target with Blood Fever, causing disease damage 
[color=#313131]____________________[/color]over 5 sec
[color=#CCCCFF]Disorient[/color][color=#313131]___________[/color]Reduces target\'s physical damage by 70% for 10 sec
[color=#CCCCFF]Daze[/color][color=#313131]________________[/color]The target will flee in fear for 5 sec
[color=#CCCCFF]Imminent Death[/color][color=#313131]______[/color]If the target is at or below 25% health, you gain Imminent Death 
[color=#313131]____________________[/color]effect, that increases your damage by 75% for 10 sec
[color=#CCCCFF]Affiliation[/color][color=#313131]_________[/color]If the target is afflicted with Doom or Decay, Death Grasp deals 
[color=#313131]____________________[/color]x disease damage per each spell
[color=#CCCCFF]Dark Arts[/color][color=#313131]___________[/color]If the target is too close, Death Grasp will push the target away instead
[color=#CCCCFF]Dark Bargain[/color][color=#313131]________[/color]At night, your Death Grasp has a chance to paralyze the target for 5 sec
[/code]
[img=right]http://images4.wikia.nocookie.net/__cb20120221192923/elderscrolls/images/thumb/1/1d/MAGINVReanimate.png/240px-MAGINVReanimate.png[/img]
[i][color=#C4C3D0]The dead do not suffer the living to pass.[/color][/i]
[color=#66FF00][size=4]Animated Dead[/size][/color]
[color=#92C9EE]Summons 3 Deathguards for x sec[/color]
Conjuration - Adept[code]
[color=#CCCCFF]Afterlife[/color][color=#313131]___________[/color]Increases Animated Dead duration by 100%
[color=#CCCCFF]Death\'s Embrace[/color][color=#313131]_____[/color]Increases the minion\'s health, stamina and magicka by
[color=#313131]____________________[/color]5% per your level
[color=#CCCCFF]Dead\'s Aegis[/color][color=#313131]________[/color]Increases your minion\'s armor by 250
[color=#CCCCFF]Power of the Dead[/color][color=#313131]___[/color]Increases your minion\'s physical damage by 50%
[color=#CCCCFF]Will of the Dead[/color][color=#313131]____[/color]Increases your minion\'s magic resistance by 50%
[color=#CCCCFF]Deathfury[/color][color=#313131]___________[/color]Your minions explode upon death, dealing poison damage in a 
[color=#313131]____________________[/color]small area
[color=#CCCCFF]Poison Cloak[/color][color=#313131]________[/color]Your minions deal poison damage to all enemies in melee range
[/code]
[line]
Champions of Light: Those that believe in all that is good and lawful, take up the call to smite all those that are do not belong in this world; the Paladin, Priest and Cleric will learn Holy Bolt, Divine Armor and Divine Light.
[img=right]http://images4.wikia.nocookie.net/__cb20120513035726/elderscrolls/images/thumb/e/e7/MAGINVLightSpellArt.png/240px-MAGINVLightSpellArt.png[/img]
[i][color=#C4C3D0]The caster knows the true power of healing allies or blasting foes. A Champions of Light, when dawn breaks there is a sense of more purpose and determination, creating deadlier bolts to those that oppose or greater restoration for those that follow the righteous cause.[/color][/i]
[color=#ffd700][size=4]Holy Bolt[/size][/color]
[color=#92C9EE]Blasts the target with light, causing x healing to an ally or x damage to an enemy[/color] 
Restoration - Adept[code]
[color=#FFFF7F]Power[/color][color=#313131]_______________[/color]Increases Holy Bolt damage and healing by 50%
[color=#FFFF7F]Conviction[/color][color=#313131]__________[/color]Holy Bolt deal 50% more damage to undead
[color=#FFFF7F]Exorcism[/color][color=#313131]____________[/color]Holy Bolt unsummons hostile summoned creatures
[color=#FFFF7F]Sunlight[/color][color=#313131]____________[/color]Increases Holy Bolt effectiveness by 35% when cast from 6:00 
[color=#313131]____________________[/color]to 19:00
[color=#FFFF7F]Pacify[/color][color=#313131]______________[/color]Holy Bolt has a chance to pacify the enemy target
[color=#FFFF7F]Inspiration[/color][color=#313131]_________[/color]Holy Bolt has a chance to apply healing-over-time effect for
[color=#313131]____________________[/color]6 sec
[color=#FFFF7F]Redemption[/color][color=#313131]__________[/color]Increases healing of Holy Bolt by 25% if the target is at or below 30% health
[color=#313131]____________________[/color]Increases damage of Holy Bolt by 25% if the target is at or below 30% health
[/code]
[img=right]http://images2.wikia.nocookie.net/__cb20120311054513/elderscrolls/images/thumb/d/d6/MAGINVWardSpellArt.png/240px-MAGINVWardSpellArt.png[/img]
[i][color=#C4C3D0]Solar-light fills the body, imbuing the caster with powers normally reserved for the immortals of legend. However, a Champion of Light, doesn’t seem quite right, at night.[/color][/i]
[color=#ffd700][size=4]Divine Armor[/size][/color]
[color=#92C9EE]Imbues the caster with divine energy, reducing damage taken by 10% for x sec[/color]
Restoration - Adept[code]
[color=#FFFF7F]Highborn[/color][color=#313131]____________[/color]Increases your magic resistance by 25%
[color=#FFFF7F]Holy Avenger[/color][color=#313131]________[/color]Increases damage dealt to undead by 30%
[color=#FFFF7F]Power of the Light[/color][color=#313131]XC[/color]Increases your healing spells effectiveness by 25% when cast 
[color=#313131]____________________[/color]from 6:00 to 19:00
[color=#FFFF7F]Divine Presence[/color][color=#313131]_____[/color]Increases your magicka and stamina by 100 when cast
[color=#313131]____________________[/color]from 6:00 to 19:00
[color=#FFFF7F]Divine Insight[/color][color=#313131]______[/color]Reduces magicka cost for all spells by 15%
[color=#FFFF7F]Crusade[/color][color=#313131]_____________[/color]Increases your physical damage by 25% when cast 
[color=#313131]____________________[/color]from 6:00 to 19:00
[color=#FFFF7F]Divine Intervention[/color][color=#313131]X[/color]Grants immunity to all damage for 7 seconds if your health drops below 25%. Can\'t occur more 
[color=#313131]____________________[/color]than once per minute or at night
[/code]
[img=right]http://images4.wikia.nocookie.net/__cb20120311054338/elderscrolls/images/thumb/c/ca/MAGINVTurnUndead.png/240px-MAGINVTurnUndead.png[/img]
[i][color=#C4C3D0]They have discovered the knowledge of replenishing life force, as well as the magick user’s essence; magicka. The Paladin uses divine arcanes to create armors that could not possibly be forged by man\'s simply hammer.[/color][/i]
[color=#ffd700][size=4]Divine Light[/size][/color]
[color=#92C9EE]Restores x health to the caster[/color]
Restoration - ??[code]
[color=#FFFF7F]Power[/color][color=#313131]_______________[/color]Increases Divine Light effectiveness by 50%
[color=#FFFF7F]Divine Aegis[/color][color=#313131]________[/color]Divine Light has a chance to increase your armor by 300
[color=#313131]____________________[/color]for 20 sec
[color=#FFFF7F]Divine Mind[/color][color=#313131]_________[/color]Divine Light has a chance to restore twice as much health
[color=#FFFF7F]Daybreak[/color][color=#313131]____________[/color]Increases Divine Light effectiveness by 50% if cast from 6:00
[color=#313131]____________________[/color]to 19:00
[color=#FFFF7F]Halo[/color][color=#313131]________________[/color]Divine Light has a chance to apply healing-over-time effect for
[color=#313131]____________________[/color]10 seconds
[color=#FFFF7F]Revelation[/color][color=#313131]__________[/color]If you cast Divine Light at full health, it restores magicka 
[color=#313131]____________________[/color]instead
[color=#FFFF7F]Shining Will[/color][color=#313131]________[/color]Divine Light has a chance to apply Shining Will effect, that lasts for 10 seconds and reduces 
[color=#313131]____________________[/color]magicka cost for all spells by 100%
[/code]
[line]
Magi of Nature: Animist, Shaman, Alchemist and the Druid all harness the powers of nature. The spells they are predisposed to are Healing Touch, Poison Swarm, Petrify, Venomous Mushroom, Summon Sabretooth and Summon Cordweller.
[img=right]http://images4.wikia.nocookie.net/__cb20120311054338/elderscrolls/images/thumb/c/ca/MAGINVTurnUndead.png/240px-MAGINVTurnUndead.png[/img]
[i][color=#C4C3D0]The Shaman has gone above and beyond the normal fair of healers in Tamriel and also calls upon the earth’s natural abilities to revitalize, even soothing the beasts that roam with them.[/color][/i]
[color=#D5AF7D][size=4]Healing Touch[/size][/color]
[color=#92C9EE]Restores x health per sec to the caster for x sec[/color]
?? - ??[code]
[color=#7CDF73]Power[/color][color=#313131]_______________[/color]Increases Healing Touch effectiveness by 50%
[color=#7CDF73]Nature\'s Touch[/color][color=#313131]______[/color]Increases Healing Touch duration by 8 sec
[color=#7CDF73]Synergy[/color][color=#313131]_____________[/color]Healing Touch increases your poison resistance by 75 for its
[color=#313131]____________________[/color]duration. If you cast Healing Touch while your Sabretooth is
[color=#313131]____________________[/color]active, applies healing effect to Sabretooth
[color=#7CDF73]Animal Allegiance[/color][color=#313131]___[/color]Healing Touch reduces damage taken from animals by 75% for its 
[color=#313131]____________________[/color]duration
[color=#7CDF73]Accelerated Growth[/color][color=#313131]__[/color]Healing Touch restores additional 5% health on each tick if your 
[color=#313131]____________________[/color]health is at or below 35%
[color=#7CDF73]Nature\'s Wrath[/color][color=#313131]______[/color]While being attacked while Healing Touch is active, you have a chance to cast Poison Swarm at
[color=#313131]____________________[/color]the attacker
[color=#7CDF73]Overgrowth[/color][color=#313131]__________[/color]When Healing Touch ends, it restores additional 25% of your current health
[/code]
[img=right]http://images2.wikia.nocookie.net/__cb20120311053524/elderscrolls/images/thumb/c/c6/MAGINVParalyze.png/240px-MAGINVParalyze.png[/img]
[i][color=#C4C3D0]The swarm has been known to build into frenzy, engulfing all that get too close and stinging with poisonous vigour. One too many of these will leave even the biggest of foes paralyzed.[/color][/i]
[color=#D5AF7D][size=4]Poison Swarm[/size][/color]
[color=#92C9EE]Sends forth a swarm, causing x poison damage per second to the target for x sec[/color] 
?? - ??[code]
[color=#7CDF73]Power[/color][color=#313131]_______________[/color]Increases Poison Swarm damage by 100%
[color=#7CDF73]Intoxication[/color][color=#313131]________[/color]Increases Poison Swarm duration by 100%
[color=#7CDF73]Toxin[/color][color=#313131]_______________[/color]Reduces target\'s poison resistance by 20% for 10 sec
[color=#7CDF73]Deadly Poison[/color][color=#313131]_______[/color]Each tick has a chance to deal additional 10-15 points of
[color=#313131]____________________[/color]unresistable damage
[color=#7CDF73]Deceleration[/color][color=#313131]________[/color]Each tick has a chance to decrease target\'s attack speed by 
[color=#313131]____________________[/color]50% for 15 sec
[color=#7CDF73]Paralyze[/color][color=#313131]____________[/color]Each tick has a chance to paralyze the target for 3 sec
[color=#7CDF73]Poison Cloud[/color][color=#313131]________[/color]Applies Poison Swarm to all enemies near the target
[/code]
[img=right]http://images1.wikia.nocookie.net/__cb20120513035902/elderscrolls/images/thumb/f/fd/MAGINVTelekinesis.png/240px-MAGINVTelekinesis.png[/img]
[i][color=#C4C3D0]The elemental mages can turn flesh to rock. Its those who truely look to Gaia for guidence that will then turn rock to dust.[/color][/i]
[color=#D5AF7D][size=4]Petrify[/size][/color]
[color=#92C9EE]Turns enemies to stone, immobilizing them for 4 sec[/color] 
?? - ??[code]
[color=#7CDF73]Venenation[/color][color=#313131]__________[/color]Poisons the target, dealing poison damage over 6 sec
[color=#7CDF73]Petrification[/color][color=#313131]_______[/color]Increases Petrify duration by 4 sec
[color=#7CDF73]Stone Curse[/color][color=#313131]_________[/color]Petrify increases target\'s armor by 500, but reduces fire, frost
[color=#313131]____________________[/color]and shock resistance by 25% for its duration
[color=#7CDF73]Susceptibility[/color][color=#313131]______[/color]Reduces petrified target\'s poison resistance by 65%
[color=#7CDF73]Burden[/color][color=#313131]______________[/color]When Petrify ends, reduces target\'s movement speed by 75 for 
[color=#313131]____________________[/color]5 sec
[color=#7CDF73]Fragmentation[/color][color=#313131]_______[/color]When Petrify ends, causes the target to explode, staggering
[color=#313131]____________________[/color]nearest targets
[color=#7CDF73]Fragility[/color][color=#313131]___________[/color]Each attack against petrified targets can kill them
[/code]
[img=right]http://images4.wikia.nocookie.net/__cb20120513035814/elderscrolls/images/thumb/c/c0/MAGINVSummon.png/240px-MAGINVSummon.png[/img]
[i][color=#C4C3D0]The Alchemists who walk amongst the flora of Tamerial know the secrets of the magic mushroom. Dazzled by the spectical of the Venomous Mushroom is always a favourite pastime.[/color][/i]
[color=#D5AF7D][size=4]Venomous Mushroom[/size][/color]
[color=#92C9EE]Plants a Venomous Mushroom at the target position that explodes every 3 seconds, dealing x poison damage per sec for 5 sec. Mushroom lasts for 30 sec.[/color] 
Conjuration - ??[code]
[color=#7CDF73]Power[/color][color=#313131]_______________[/color]Increases explosion damage by 50%
[color=#7CDF73]Dissemination[/color][color=#313131]_______[/color]Increases explosion radius by 100%
[color=#7CDF73]Intensity[/color][color=#313131]___________[/color]Reduces the time between explosions by 1 sec
[color=#7CDF73]Staggering Blast[/color][color=#313131]____[/color]Mushroom\'s explosion has a chance to stagger the target
[color=#7CDF73]Catalepsy[/color][color=#313131]___________[/color]Applies Petrify spell to the target
[color=#7CDF73]Wild Growth[/color][color=#313131]_________[/color]Each Mushroom increases your spell damage by 10% for its
[color=#313131]____________________[/color]duration
[color=#7CDF73]Asphexia[/color][color=#313131]____________[/color]Teaches you the Asphexia spell
[/code]

[color=#D5AF7D][size=4]Asphexia[/size][/color]
[color=#92C9EE]Deals x poison damage to all targets poisoned by your Mushrooms and paralyzes them for 3 sec. Can\'t be cast more that once per 30 sec[/color]
?? - ??

[img=right]http://images4.wikia.nocookie.net/__cb20120513035814/elderscrolls/images/thumb/c/c0/MAGINVSummon.png/240px-MAGINVSummon.png[/img]
[i][color=#C4C3D0]The trust and bond between owner and beast has always been a test of wills, but the might of the Sabertooth has always been worth the risk.[/color][/i]
[color=#D5AF7D][size=4]Summon Sabretooth[/size][/color]
[color=#92C9EE]Summons Sabretooth for x sec[/color] 
Conjuration - ??[code]
[color=#7CDF73]Growth[/color][color=#313131]______________[/color]Increases Sabretooth health, stamina and magicka by 5% per 
[color=#313131]____________________[/color]your level
[color=#7CDF73]Taming[/color][color=#313131]______________[/color]Increases Sabretooth duration by 100%
[color=#7CDF73]Bestial Wrath[/color][color=#313131]_______[/color]Increases Sabretooth damage by 5% per your level
[color=#7CDF73]Sharp Claws[/color][color=#313131]_________[/color]Increases Sabretooth damage by 100% against petrified or frozen 
[color=#313131]____________________[/color]targets
[color=#7CDF73]Vigor of Nature[/color][color=#313131]_____[/color]While Sabretooth is active, restores 1% of your base magicka 
[color=#313131]____________________[/color]each second and increases damage of Poison Swarm, Venomous 
[color=#313131]____________________[/color]Mushroom, Asphexia and Venenation by 25%
[color=#7CDF73]Nature\'s Grace[/color][color=#313131]______[/color]While Sabretooth is active, increases your movement speed and physical damage by 25%
[color=#7CDF73]Prowl[/color][color=#313131]_______________[/color]Allows Sabretooth to prowl in shadows. When the effect ends, Sabretooth damage is increased by 
[color=#313131]____________________[/color]100% for 20 sec
[/code]
[img=right]http://images4.wikia.nocookie.net/__cb20120513035814/elderscrolls/images/thumb/c/c0/MAGINVSummon.png/240px-MAGINVSummon.png[/img]
[i][color=#C4C3D0]??[/color][/i]
[color=#D5AF7D][size=4]Summon Coredweller[/size][/color]
[color=#92C9EE]Summons the Coredweller for x sec[/color]
Conjuration - ??[code]
[color=#7CDF73]Earth and Fire[/color][color=#313131]______[/color]Increases the Coredweller\'s health, stamina and magicka by 5% 
[color=#313131]____________________[/color]per your level
[color=#7CDF73]Permanence of Stone[/color][color=#313131]X[/color]Increases the Coredweller duration by 100%
[color=#7CDF73]Stone Fists[/color][color=#313131]_________[/color]Increases the Coredweller physical damage by 25
[color=#7CDF73]Retaliation[/color][color=#313131]_________[/color]Allows the Coredweller reflect 100% damage back to attacker
[color=#7CDF73]Earth Enhancement[/color][color=#313131]___[/color]Allows the Coredweller to cast Earth Strike spell that deals 50 
[color=#313131]____________________[/color]poison damage and has a chance to petrify the target for 3 sec
[color=#7CDF73]Fire Enhancement[/color][color=#313131]____[/color]Allows the Coredweller to strike your enemies with Flame Wave 
[color=#313131]____________________[/color]that deals 75 fire damage to all targets on its way
[color=#7CDF73]Wildfire[/color][color=#313131]____________[/color]Teaches you the Wildfire spell
[/code]
[color=#D5AF7D][size=4]Wildfire [/size][/color]
[color=#92C9EE]Sacrifices your Coredweller, causing damage equal to 30% of the Coredweller\'s current health to all enemies in a 25 ft. radius. Can\'t be cast more than once every 2 minutes.[/color]
?? - ??
[line]
Pyromancers: It all started with a simple flame, but the fascination with fire soon grew amongst the magick users. Now they can command this element in such a way that the very heavens open up to rain down hell upon this world. Pyromancers have Conflagrate, Fire Blast, Solar Sphere and Meteor Shower in their arsenal.
[img=right]http://static.skyrim.nexusmods.com/images/5288407-1348011731.png[/img]
[i][color=#C4C3D0]These bolts are know to burn hotter than most, setting people on fire throughout the realm.[/color][/i]
[color=#FF8354][size=4]Conflagrate[/size][/color]
[color=#92C9EE]Hurls a fiery bolt at the target, causing x fire damage[/color]
Destruction - ??[code]
[color=#FFE382]Power[/color][color=#313131]_______________[/color]Increases Conflagrate damage by 50%
[color=#FFE382]Ignite[/color][color=#313131]______________[/color]Conflagrate has a chance to inflict fire damage over 8 sec
[color=#FFE382]Firestarter[/color][color=#313131]_________[/color]Conflagrate has a chance to apply Firestarter effect, increasing 
[color=#313131]____________________[/color]fire damage by 50% for 10 sec
[color=#FFE382]Impact[/color][color=#313131]______________[/color]Conflagrate has a chance to knock back your target
[color=#FFE382]Flamestrike[/color][color=#313131]_________[/color]Conflagrate has a chance to explode and deal fire damage in a 
[color=#313131]____________________[/color]small area
[color=#FFE382]Molten Fury[/color][color=#313131]_________[/color]Conflagrate has a chance to reduce target\'s fire resistance by
[color=#313131]____________________[/color]20% for 10 sec
[color=#FFE382]Emberstorm[/color][color=#313131]__________[/color]When you cast Conflagrate on target with more than 60% health,
[color=#313131]____________________[/color]you always deal double damage
[/code]
[img=right]http://static.skyrim.nexusmods.com/images/5288407-1348011731.png[/img]
[i][color=#C4C3D0]Once you see an arm melt off a persons body from a Fire Blast, you\'ll know that this is for you.[/color][/i]
[color=#FF8354][size=4]Fire Blast[/size][/color]
[color=#92C9EE]Blasts the target, causing x fire damage[/color]
Destruction - Adept[code]
[color=#FFE382]Power[/color][color=#313131]_______________[/color]Increases Fire Blast damage by 50%
[color=#FFE382]Hot Streak[/color][color=#313131]__________[/color]Fire Blast has a chance to apply Hot Streak effect, which
[color=#313131]____________________[/color]increases Fire Blast damage by 50% for 8 sec
[color=#FFE382]Searing Pain[/color][color=#313131]________[/color]Fire Blast has a chance to apply damage-over-time effect, that
[color=#313131]____________________[/color]deals fire damage over 8 sec
[color=#FFE382]Combustion[/color][color=#313131]__________[/color]If the target is affected by Ignite or Searing Pain, Fire Blast
[color=#313131]____________________[/color]deals additional 50% damage per each effect
[color=#FFE382]Disarm[/color][color=#313131]______________[/color]Fire Blast has a chance to disarm your target
[color=#FFE382]Havoc[/color][color=#313131]_______________[/color]Fire Blast deals additional damage if the target is not
[color=#313131]____________________[/color]attacking you
[color=#FFE382]Cremation[/color][color=#313131]___________[/color]Fire Blast has a chance to instantly kill the targets at or below 25% health
[/code]
[img=right]http://static.skyrim.nexusmods.com/images/5288407-1348011731.png[/img]
[i][color=#C4C3D0]Those that take time to study the subtle differences in the forces of the solar energies, will behold the not so subtle effects of the Solar Sphere. The warrior knows that not only does a flaming sword look good, but when they here the screams of pain from metal burning flesh, those years at the College were worth it.[/color][/i]
[color=#FF8354][size=4]Solar Sphere[/size][/color]
[color=#92C9EE]Summons a Solar Sphere at caster position for x sec. Solar sphere strikes enemies in a small area with Sun Beam, causing x fire damage[/color]
?? - ??[code]
[color=#FFE382]Power[/color][color=#313131]_______________[/color]Increases Sun Beam damage by 50%
[color=#FFE382]Resonance[/color][color=#313131]___________[/color]Increases Solar Sphere duration by 100%
[color=#FFE382]Molten Core[/color][color=#313131]_________[/color]Increases your fire damage by 20% while Solar Sphere is active
[color=#FFE382]Heat[/color][color=#313131]________________[/color]Increases Solar Sphere area of effect by 100%
[color=#FFE382]Affinity[/color][color=#313131]____________[/color]Increases your fire resistance by 25% while Solar Sphere is
[color=#313131]____________________[/color]active
[color=#FFE382]Wildfire[/color][color=#313131]____________[/color]Reduces the interval between Sun Beams by 1 sec
[color=#FFE382]Inner Fire[/color][color=#313131]__________[/color]Imbues your weapon with fire while Solar Sphere is active
[/code]
[img=right]http://static.skyrim.nexusmods.com/images/5288407-1348011731.png[/img]
[i][color=#C4C3D0]The Nords normally assume armageddon has come.[/color][/i]
[color=#FF8354][size=4]Meteor Shower[/size][/color]
[color=#92C9EE]Summons 4 fiery meteors down upon the target, causing x physical damage. Can only be cast outdoors.[/color]
Destruction - ??[code]
[color=#FFE382]Power[/color][color=#313131]_______________[/color]Increases Meteor Shower damage by 50%
[color=#FFE382]Barrage[/color][color=#313131]_____________[/color]Increases meteors count by 4
[color=#FFE382]Volatility[/color][color=#313131]__________[/color]Converts 50% Meteor Shower damage to fire damage
[color=#FFE382]Impulse[/color][color=#313131]_____________[/color]Each meteor has a chance to knockdown the target
[color=#FFE382]Heart of Fire[/color][color=#313131]_______[/color]When Meteor Shower ends, you gain Heart of Fire effect, that
[color=#313131]____________________[/color]increases damage of your Fire Blast, Conflagrate, Solar Sphere
[color=#313131]____________________[/color]and Meteor Shower by 25% for the next 10 sec
[color=#FFE382]Soften Armor[/color][color=#313131]________[/color]When Meteor Shower ends, if the target survives, reduces armor
[color=#313131]____________________[/color]by 150 for the next 10 sec
[color=#FFE382]Flame Surge[/color][color=#313131]_________[/color]When meteors hit the target with less than 50% health, there is
[color=#313131]____________________[/color]a chance to call additional fiery meteor
[/code]
[line]
Mystics of the Arcane: Those that seek to alter reality; the Wizard, Mentalist, Visionary and Distorter, use Spectral Missle, Arcane Blast, Arcane Explosion and Arcane Cloak to bend the very fabric of this world.

[img=right]http://images2.wikia.nocookie.net/__cb20120221192920/elderscrolls/images/thumb/2/29/MAGINVAlteration.png/240px-MAGINVAlteration.png[/img]
[i][color=#C4C3D0]Those that have already succumbed to the manipulations of the mind will feel the full force of the Spectral Missile. Made of the same unworldly substance, those summoned will perish. Amongst the chaos of the weak willed, spectral explosions have been seen for miles around.[/color][/i]
[color=#8C90FC][size=4]Spectral Missile[/size][/color]
[color=#92C9EE]Hurls a bolt of energy, causing x magic damage to the target and additional x magic damage over 6 sec[/color]
?? - ??[code]
[color=#ADE9B2]Power[/color][color=#313131]_______________[/color]Increases Spectral Missile damage by 50%
[color=#ADE9B2]Mind Blast[/color][color=#313131]__________[/color]Spectral Missile deals double damage to feared, frenzied or 
[color=#313131]____________________[/color]pacified targets
[color=#ADE9B2]Fickleness[/color][color=#313131]__________[/color]When Spectral Missile hits the target, there is a chance for one 
[color=#313131]____________________[/color]of the following:
[color=#313131]____________________[/color]25 additional fire damage
[color=#313131]____________________[/color]25 additional frost damage
[color=#313131]____________________[/color]30 additional poison damage over 3 sec
[color=#ADE9B2]Domination[/color][color=#313131]__________[/color]Instantly kills hostile summoned creatures
[color=#ADE9B2]Spectral Charge[/color][color=#313131]_____[/color]Spectral Missile also deals 1 to 120 electric damage
[color=#ADE9B2]Master Mind[/color][color=#313131]_________[/color]Spectral Missile restores 15% of your base magicka if the target is feared, frenzied or 
[color=#313131]____________________[/color]pacified
[color=#ADE9B2]Spectral Bomb[/color][color=#313131]_______[/color]When you cast Spectral Missile on the enemy, influenced with Fear, Frenzy or Pacify, you set 
[color=#313131]____________________[/color]Spectral Bomb that explode in 5 sec, causing 75 magic damage to all targets within 25 ft radius
[/code]
[img=right]http://images3.wikia.nocookie.net/__cb20120221192922/elderscrolls/images/thumb/1/1b/MAGINVIllusionDark01.png/240px-MAGINVIllusionDark01.png[/img]
[color=#8C90FC][size=4]Arcane Blast[/size][/color]
[color=#92C9EE]Sends out a powerful ripple of distortion, causing x magic damage to the target[/color] 
?? - ??[code]
[color=#ADE9B2]Time Warp[/color][color=#313131]___________[/color]Puts the target to out-of-time state, rendering them immobile 
[color=#313131]____________________[/color]for 20 sec. Any damage will interrupt the effect
[color=#ADE9B2]Arcane Torrent[/color][color=#313131]______[/color]Arcane Blast has a chance to deal twice as much damage
[color=#ADE9B2]Temporal Rift[/color][color=#313131]_______[/color]If you cast Arcane Blast on target affected by Time Warp, you 
[color=#313131]____________________[/color]gain Temporal Rift effect, reducing magicka cost of Arcane 
[color=#313131]____________________[/color]Blast, Arcane Explosion and Spectral Missile by 100% for 15 sec
[color=#ADE9B2]Arcane Resonance[/color][color=#313131]____[/color]Arcane Blast always deal double damage if you cast it from 
[color=#313131]____________________[/color]behind the target
[color=#ADE9B2]Phantom Strike[/color][color=#313131]______[/color]Arcane Blast has a chance to apply Phantom Strike effect,
[color=#313131]____________________[/color]increasing your spell damage by 100% for 10 sec
[color=#ADE9B2]Phantasm[/color][color=#313131]____________[/color]Arcane Blast is always counted as cast from behind the target
[/code]
[img=right]http://images1.wikia.nocookie.net/__cb20120311060520/elderscrolls/images/thumb/f/f0/MagicHatMarker.png/240px-MagicHatMarker.png[/img]
[color=#8C90FC][size=4]Arcane Explosion[/size][/color]
[color=#92C9EE]A burst of mystical energy that deals x magic damage to all targets near the caster[/color]
?? - ??[code]
[color=#ADE9B2]Onslaught[/color][color=#313131]___________[/color]All targets in the vicinity become frenzied for 20 sec
[color=#ADE9B2]Mind Trick[/color][color=#313131]__________[/color]If your Arcane Explosion hits more than 2 targets at once, slows 
[color=#313131]____________________[/color]the time and turns you invisible for 30 sec
[color=#ADE9B2]Wither[/color][color=#313131]______________[/color]Arcane Explosion drains all magicka from the target
[color=#ADE9B2]Arcane Bomb[/color][color=#313131]_________[/color]Sets an Arcane Bomb at the target location. Bomb will explode in 
[color=#313131]____________________[/color]5 sec, causing 50 magic damage to all targets in the vicinity
[color=#ADE9B2]Psionic Burn[/color][color=#313131]________[/color]Arcane Explosion applies Psionic Burn effect for 10 sec. While 
[color=#313131]____________________[/color]this effect is active, the target receives additional magic 
[color=#313131]____________________[/color]damage while being attacked
[color=#ADE9B2]Distortion Field[/color][color=#313131]____[/color]If your Arcane Explosion hits more than 3 targets at once, 
[color=#313131]____________________[/color]places a distortion field at your position. For 20 sec 
[color=#313131]____________________[/color]afterwards, all affected targets that are trying to leave the field, will be pulled back to 
[color=#313131]____________________[/color]distortion field center
[/code]
[img=right]http://images2.wikia.nocookie.net/__cb20120311054513/elderscrolls/images/thumb/d/d6/MAGINVWardSpellArt.png/240px-MAGINVWardSpellArt.png[/img]
[i][color=#C4C3D0][/color][/i]
[color=#8C90FC][size=4]Arcane Cloak[/size][/color]
[color=#92C9EE]Protects the caster with magic cloak that negates damage taken, draining stamina instead. Drains 5 stamina per 1 point of damage absorbed. Lasts x sec[/color]
?? - ??[code]
[color=#ADE9B2]Arcane Trance[/color][color=#313131]_______[/color]Reduces amount of stamina drained per damage point by 2
[color=#ADE9B2]Premonition[/color][color=#313131]_________[/color]While Arcane Cloak is active, gives a chance to dodge enemy 
[color=#313131]____________________[/color]attack
[color=#ADE9B2]Temporal Distortion[/color][color=#313131]X[/color]While Arcane Cloak is active, reduces shouts recovery time 
[color=#313131]____________________[/color]by 20%
[color=#ADE9B2]Arcane Power[/color][color=#313131]________[/color]While Arcane Cloak is active, increases your spell damage by 15%
[color=#ADE9B2]Tonus[/color][color=#313131]_______________[/color]While Arcane Cloak is active, increases your stamina by 100
[color=#ADE9B2]Tenacity[/color][color=#313131]____________[/color]While Arcane Cloak is active, reduces falling damage by 80%
[color=#ADE9B2]Arcane Torrent[/color][color=#313131]______[/color]If you run out of stamina while Arcane Cloak is active, each 
[color=#313131]____________________[/color]enemy hit restores 3 stamina per damage point received
[/code]
[line]
Frost Mage: Feared by most, the changing seasons of Tamriel do not change the temperament or effectiveness of the elemental ice mages. But be warned...winter is coming!
[img=right]http://images4.wikia.nocookie.net/__cb20120311052734/elderscrolls/images/thumb/7/7f/MAGINVIceSpellArt.png/240px-MAGINVIceSpellArt.png[/img]
[i][color=#C4C3D0] [/color][/i]
[color=#95DAFF][size=4]Ice Lance[/size][/color]
[color=#92C9EE]Hurls a spear of ice at the target, that causes x points of frost damage to health and stamina[/color] 
Destruction - ??[code]
[color=#CFEDF7]Power[/color][color=#313131]_______________[/color]Increases Ice Lance damage by 50%
[color=#CFEDF7]Replenish[/color][color=#313131]___________[/color]Ice Lance applies Replenish effect, restoring 5 magicka per sec 
[color=#313131]____________________[/color]for 5 sec
[color=#CFEDF7]Frost Fever[/color][color=#313131]_________[/color]Ice Lance applies Frost Fever effect, dealing 30 frost damage 
[color=#313131]____________________[/color]over 5 sec
[color=#CFEDF7]Piercing Ice[/color][color=#313131]________[/color]Ice Lance reduces the target\'s frost resistance by 20%
[color=#313131]____________________[/color]for 10 sec
[color=#CFEDF7]Cold Snap[/color][color=#313131]___________[/color]Ice Lance has a chance to freeze the target for 5 sec
[color=#CFEDF7]Deathchill[/color][color=#313131]__________[/color]Ice Lance deals triple damage to frozen targets
[color=#CFEDF7]Shatter[/color][color=#313131]_____________[/color]Ice Lance has a chance to instantly kill frozen target
[/code]
[img=right]http://images4.wikia.nocookie.net/__cb20120311052734/elderscrolls/images/thumb/7/7f/MAGINVIceSpellArt.png/240px-MAGINVIceSpellArt.png[/img]
[i][color=#C4C3D0] [/color][/i]
[color=#95DAFF][size=4]Frost Blast[/size][/color]
[color=#92C9EE]Projects an ice cold blast at the target, causing x frost damage. Has a chance to instantly kill frozen targets.[/color]
?? - ??[code]
[color=#CFEDF7]Power[/color][color=#313131]_______________[/color]Increases Frost Blast damage by 50%
[color=#CFEDF7]Deathchill[/color][color=#313131]__________[/color]Frost Blast deals triple damage to frozen targets
[color=#CFEDF7]Cold Snap[/color][color=#313131]___________[/color]Frost Blast has a chance to freeze the target for 5 sec
[color=#CFEDF7]Chilled to the Bone[/color][color=#313131]X[/color]Frost Blast reduces the target\'s physical damage by 50% 
[color=#313131]____________________[/color]for 10 sec
[color=#CFEDF7]Penetration[/color][color=#313131]_________[/color]Frost Blast ignores all target\'s resistances
[color=#CFEDF7]Heart of Frost[/color][color=#313131]______[/color]Frost Blast has a chance to apply Heart of Frost effect, 
[color=#313131]____________________[/color]increasing your frost damage by 100% for 10 sec
[color=#CFEDF7]Iceflow[/color][color=#313131]_____________[/color]Each time you hit the target with Frost Blast, you gain one 
[color=#313131]____________________[/color]charge. Once you gain 5 charges, Frost Blast unleashes 
[color=#CFEDF7]Iceflow[/color][color=#313131]devastating Frost Wave at the enemies in a 25 ft radius
[/code]
[img=right]http://images4.wikia.nocookie.net/__cb20120513035814/elderscrolls/images/thumb/c/c0/MAGINVSummon.png/240px-MAGINVSummon.png[/img]
[i][color=#C4C3D0] [/color][/i]
[color=#95DAFF][size=4]Summon the Restless[/size][/color]
[color=#92C9EE]Summons the Restless for x sec.[/color]
Conjuration  - ??[code]
[color=#CFEDF7]Soulbound[/color][color=#313131]___________[/color]Increases the Restless health, magicka and stamina by 5% per 
[color=#313131]____________________[/color]your level
[color=#CFEDF7]Winter\'s Gift[/color][color=#313131]_______[/color]Increases the Restless duration by 100%
[color=#CFEDF7]Frost Aura[/color][color=#313131]__________[/color]While the Restless is active, your frost spells deal 20% more 
[color=#313131]____________________[/color]damage
[color=#CFEDF7]Frost Mastery[/color][color=#313131]_______[/color]Allows the Restless to cast Frost Blast and Frost Cloak spells. 
[color=#313131]____________________[/color]Ice Wave now also freezes the target for 5 sec
[color=#CFEDF7]Hoarfrost[/color][color=#313131]___________[/color]When the Restless dies, freezes all targets in the vicinity
[color=#CFEDF7]Ghostly State[/color][color=#313131]_______[/color]Makes the Restless immune to physical damage
[color=#CFEDF7]Glacial Armor[/color][color=#313131]_______[/color]Teaches you Glacial Armor spell
[/code]

[color=#95DAFF][size=4]Glacial Armor[/size][/color]
[color=#92C9EE]Sacrifices the Restless, granting immunity to all damage for 30 sec. Can\'t be cast more than once per 10 min[/color]
?? - ??
[line]
Storm Mage: The elemental mage calls on the Gods of the sky, to summon the deadlist of Tamriels natural forces. Not even the Gaints stay outdoor when Magi storms are brewing!

[img=right]http://images1.wikia.nocookie.net/__cb20120221192953/elderscrolls/images/thumb/5/5f/MAGINVShockSpellArt.png/240px-MAGINVShockSpellArt.png[/img]
[i][color=#C4C3D0]Those that thought the eye of a storm would be the calmest, are usually the first to die.[/color][/i]
[color=#C2A9FF][size=4]Eye of the Storm[/size][/color]
[color=#92C9EE]Summons an Eye of the Storm at caster position for x sec. Eye of Storm strikes everything in a small area with lightning, causing x shock damage.[/color]
Destruction - ??[code]
[color=#E6D6FD]Power[/color][color=#313131]_______________[/color]Increases lightning damage by 50%
[color=#E6D6FD]Thunderstorm[/color][color=#313131]________[/color]Increases Eye of the Storm duration by 100%
[color=#E6D6FD]Squall[/color][color=#313131]______________[/color]Reduces interval between lightning
[color=#E6D6FD]Storm Cloak[/color][color=#313131]_________[/color]Increases your shock resistance by 25% while Eye of the Storm is 
[color=#313131]____________________[/color]active
[color=#E6D6FD]Heart of Storm[/color][color=#313131]______[/color]While Eye of the Storm is active, your shock spells deal 25% 
[color=#313131]____________________[/color]more damage
[color=#E6D6FD]Static Charge[/color][color=#313131]_______[/color]When lightning hits the target, for 8 sec afterwards the target 
[color=#313131]____________________[/color]receives additional shock damage while being attacked
[color=#E6D6FD]Electrocution[/color][color=#313131]_______[/color]Lightning instantly kills targets with less than 20% health
[/code]

[img=right]http://images1.wikia.nocookie.net/__cb20120221192953/elderscrolls/images/thumb/5/5f/MAGINVShockSpellArt.png/240px-MAGINVShockSpellArt.png[/img]
[i][color=#C4C3D0]If the lightning doesn\'t kill them, the thunder will shake their bones apart.[/color][/i]
[color=#C2A9FF][size=4]Thunderstrike[/size][/color]
[color=#92C9EE]Strikes the target with lightning, causing x shock damage to health, and half that to magicka[/color]
Destruction - ??[code]
[color=#E6D6FD]Power[/color][color=#313131]_______________[/color]Increases Thunderstrike damage by 50%
[color=#E6D6FD]Thunderer[/color][color=#313131]___________[/color]Thunderstrike has a chance to strike the same target twice
[color=#E6D6FD]Electrify[/color][color=#313131]___________[/color]When Thunderstrike hits the target, it has a chance to explode 
[color=#313131]____________________[/color]and deal additional shock damage to all targets in a small area
[color=#E6D6FD]Grounding[/color][color=#313131]___________[/color]Thunderstrike deals twice as much damage to targets wearing 
[color=#313131]____________________[/color]heavy armor
[color=#E6D6FD]Concussion[/color][color=#313131]__________[/color]Thunderstrike reduces the target\'s shock resistance by 20% for
[color=#313131]____________________[/color]15 sec
[color=#E6D6FD]Stormbringer[/color][color=#313131]________[/color]If you kill the target with Thunderstrike, you gain Stormbringer 
[color=#313131]____________________[/color]effect, increasing Thunderstrike damage by 25% for 20 sec
[color=#E6D6FD]Electric Storm[/color][color=#313131]______[/color]Calls additional lightning that strikes all enemies near the target
[/code]
[heading][color=#92C9EE]What extra powers are available?[/color][/heading]
[color=#32689E][size=4]Death Rift[/size][/color]
[color=#92C9EE]Summons a death rift at your feet. Upon recast, instantly teleports you to rift location. You can have only one Death Rift active at a time.[/color]

[color=#32689E][size=4]Blood Pact[/size][/color]
[color=#92C9EE]Continuously converts 10 health to 5 magicka each second until cancelled[/color]

[color=#32689E][size=4]Mana Flow[/size][/color]
[color=#92C9EE]Continuously converts 10 stamina to 5 magicka each seconds until cancelled[/color]

[color=#32689E][size=4]Mana Tap[/size][/color]
[color=#92C9EE]Continuously converts 10 health to 5 magicka each second until cancelled[/color]

[color=#32689E][size=4]Travel Form[/size][/color]
[color=#92C9EE]Increases movement speed by 75, but increases vulnerability to all attacks. Lasts until cancelled.[/color]

[color=#32689E][size=4]Frost Bomb[/size][/color]
[color=#92C9EE]Creates a magic bomb at the caster\'s feet. Upon recast, frost bomb explodes, causing 50 frost damage and freezes all enemies in a 10 ft radius for 5 sec[/color]

[color=#32689E][size=4]Mind Soothe[/size][/color]
[color=#92C9EE]Fools the target, forcing them to attack illusionary phantoms for x sec[/color]

[color=#32689E][size=4]Arcane Mind[/size][/color]
[color=#92C9EE]Consumes a dragon soul, increasing experience gained by your spells for 1 hour[/color]

[color=#32689E][size=4]Bottomless Bag[/size][/color]
[color=#92C9EE]Activates your bottomless bag. Requires a dragon soul to activate[/color]
[heading][color=#92C9EE]Where can I get the spells?[/color][/heading]
Some adept spells are sold by Dominus, a new vendor wandering over Whiterun. The rest can be found in strongboxes in various dungeons listed below:
[list]
[*]Bleak Falls Barrow
[*]Cidhna Mine
[*]Folgunthur
[*]Forelhost
[*]Korvanjund
[*]Pinewatch
